card.name: Master of Wood, Water, or Hill
Warm Now Be Heart and Limb

property.name: Special
property.value: Special: This site is always returned to the location deck, never to the discard pile.

property.name: Auto Attack
property.value: When a company enters this site, opponent may play one creature from his hand that is treated in all ways as the site's automatic attack (if defeated, creature is discarded). It must normally be playable keyed to a Ruins & Lairs {R}, Shadow-hold {S}, single Wilderness {w}, or Shadow-land {s}.

property.name: Special
property.value: Items may be played here even if the site is tapped.
